tooltip.en: An identifier for the set of location information (data associated with dcterms:Location). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set. Example(s): https://opencontext.org/subjects/ 768A875F-E205-4D0B-DE55-BAB7598D0FD1. See Darwin Core's locationID.

meta.name: Location ID
meta.source: Darwin Core Quick Reference Guide, TDWG
